title: Dawson's Creek
creator_credit: Sony Pictures Television, Outerbanks Entertainment, Columbia TriStar Television, Granville Productions, Procter & Gamble Productions (PGP), Paul Stupin, Tom Kapinos and Kevin Williamson
brief_description: Dawson’s Creek is an American teen drama that portrays the fictional lives of a close-knit group of teenagers through high school and college.

constellations_other.name: Amateur hour
constellations_other.description: Early sound equipment allowed filmmakers and amateurs alike the ability to experiment often with affordable 16mm film.
